hero.title: Special Care Management For Special Kids
hero.subtitle: A central hub to organize all essential care information for your special-needs child, accessible exactly when you need it.

featuresSection.title: Everything You Need In One Place
featuresSection.subtitle: Special Caring provides all the tools you need to manage care information for your special-needs child.

essentialInfo.title: Essential Information
essentialInfo.description: Store personal details, emergency contacts, and identification information securely.

medicalManagement.title: Medical Management
medicalManagement.description: Track medications, medical contacts, and healthcare appointments for your child.

specialNeeds.title: Special Needs Support
specialNeeds.description: Log specific requirements, therapies, and accommodations for your child's special needs.

dailyLogs.title: Daily Logs
dailyLogs.description: Record daily activities, behaviors, and important observations for continuity of care.

careTeam.title: Care Team Contacts
careTeam.description: Manage information for all caregivers, therapists, and family members involved in care.

growthMilestones.title: Growth Milestones
growthMilestones.description: Track developmental achievements and celebrate your child's unique progress journey.

ctaSection.title: Ready to simplify your special caregiving journey?
ctaSection.subtitle: Join other special-needs families who have found relief through better care organization.

benefits.saveTime: Save time with easy information access
benefits.improveCare: Improve care coordination with all team members

testimonial.quote: "Special Caring has been a lifesaver for our family. Having all my son's information in one place has made it so much easier to coordinate with therapists and doctors."
testimonial.author: Jessica Thompson

footer.madeWith: Made with love for special-needs families
